header: Aaron’s Walking Stick Becomes a Snake

verse: The Lord said to Moses and Aaron,

So ·the king [Pharaoh] called in his wise men and his ·magicians [sorcerers], and with their ·tricks [magic arts] the Egyptian magicians were able to do the same thing [showing that they had spiritual powers supporting them].

·The king [Pharaoh] turned and went into his ·palace [house] and ·ignored what Moses and Aaron had done [did not take this to heart].
